item.title: On Whaling Erotica
item.description: poem for helen on whaling erotica helen in your exes room allow or better yet that dining table is stable soon let our utensils be our harpoons sharp our choice of words savage erotic while impulsive our hands dictators of our choice of words cause savages are slaves to their hands pigs are slaves to their minds weâ€™ll get out of this alive is my thought or lie lie down rest remain prone gives you back massage fuck till dawn dawn to dusk dusk to rash rough seas be the woman in thee my woman to be helen of joy
